aboutUs.title: Our Craft, Your Table
aboutUs.paragraph1: For three generations, Tranj has proudly served Varna and the surrounding region with premium-quality pork. As a locally rooted butcher shop, we are committed to offering meats from trusted regional providers who share our dedication to freshness, safety, and exceptional standards.
aboutUs.paragraph2: Every cut we offer is hand-selected and expertly prepared by our skilled butchers, ensuring rich flavor and reliable quality for every meal. From classic pork chops and tender roasts to specialty cuts and traditional Bulgarian favorites, we deliver products that meet the needs of families, home cooks, and professional chefs alike.

about.title: Our Story
about.description: For three generations, Tranj has been the heart of our community — delivering premium, ethically sourced meats with old-world craftsmanship.
about.legacyDescriptionOne: Founded in 1999 by Atanas Stoyanov, our shop began as a small family operation with one simple promise: serve only the finest quality meats, prepared with care and integrity.
about.legacyDescriptionTwo: Today, that promise lives on through the third generation of the family. While much has changed over the decades, our dedication to hand-selecting every cut and building genuine relationships with our customers and farmers remains the cornerstone of everything we do.
about.quality: Every cut is hand-selected and graded to ensure premium quality that meets our exacting standards.
about.community: We've proudly served our local community for three generations, building lasting relationships with every customer.
about.craft: Our master butchers bring decades of experience and passion to every cut they prepare.
